## ASSESSMENT PLAN

### Formative (Internal)

-   IA1 (6th Sem): 15 marks (theory)
-   IA2 (8th Sem): 15 marks theory + 30 practical
-   Prelims (9th Sem): 20 marks theory + 30 practical

### Summative

-   Theory: 30 marks in Surgery Paper II
-   Practical: 30 marks (20 case + 10 viva and OSCE)

## RECOMMENDED BOOKS

-   Outlines of Fractures – Adams
-   Apley’s System – Louis Solomon
-   Essentials of Orthopaedics – Maheshwari
-   Clinical Ortho Exam – McRae

**Reference Books:**

-   Campbell’s Operative Ortho
-   Rockwood & Green
-   Tachdjian’s Pediatric Ortho
